Hazoor Maharaj Ji

Ek baar Hazoor Maharaj Ji, Langar Me Darshan Dene Aaye, Jab Hazoor Apne Joote Utaar K Andar (Jaha Parshada Rakhte Hai) Gaye. To Peeche Se Koi Unke Joote Utha K Le Gaya.
Sewadar Bole Hazur Yeh Kya Ho Gaya Koi Aapke Joote Utha K Le Gaya,
Hazur Maharaj Ji(Hairaani Me) Bole K, O ho Wo Banda Apna Satyanaash Kar Lega
Sewadar Bola Hazoor Kaise Wo Apna Satyanaash Kar Lega?
Hazoor Maharaj Ji Bole, K Wo Ab Mere Jooto Ki Pooja Karta Rahega Sara-Sara Din, Jis se Uski Parmarath Me Tarakki Ruk Jayegi.
